titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I wrote a little Sermon for the Troops, when they come to the Cathedral next Sunday. Ella & I lunched with Gee & his wife in the Castle, & met the President of the Wesleyan Methodists, & a local pundit of the same persuasion. Afterwards, Gee and I walked together: & on our return, I attended Evensong in the Cathedral.
